itemReviews.review: Had this made from a picture of my Mom's handwriting. She passed away in 2006. It is now what I wear daily. I love love love it!

Absolutely ðŸ’¯ %. Love this necklace. I bought this for my Mom. My Dad passed away 25 years ago--we still miss him everyday. This necklace says " Love, Edward"... in his hand writing from an old Birthday card I found. Can't wait to gift it to her. She is going to love it. She is 83 years old now and survived Covid. Life is crazy. This necklace makes things seem a bit brighter and happier. Thank you !
Thank you so much. I loved the necklace so much I had to order another one!! Youâ€™re so talented!
